nodes.text: Minecraft Star Wars is an expansion to the popular 3D building game Minecraft, released on multiple platforms. To date, there have been five Star Wars-themed skin packs, one focused on the original trilogy, another focused on the prequel trilogy and The Clone Wars TV show, one focused on the sequel trilogy, one focused on Star Wars Rebels, and another on Solo: A Star Wars Story.

On November 16, 2020, developers Mojang Studios and 4J Studios, along with Disney and Lucasfilm, released the "Minecraft Star Wars DLC," featuring characters and locations from A New Hope, The Empire Strikes Back, Return of the Jedi, and The Mandalorian (Season 1).
